name: fullmoon
description: This is a Framework that can help to generate views for your applications

scripts.build-application: npm run-script build-sugar && npm run-script build-coffee
scripts.build-test-coffee: node node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee -o test testSrc/test.build.coffee  && mv test/test.build.js test/test.js
scripts.run-test: npm run-script build-sugar && npm run-script build-coffee && npm run-script build-test-sugar && npm run-script build-test-coffee && echo 'running test' && node test/test.js
scripts.command-test: npm run-script build-application && npm run-script build-command-sugar && npm run-script build-command-test && npm run-script command-test-run

author: Shavauhn Gabay
